Sentence.sentence: The final legislation might throw a public plan into the competition, but thanks to the fierce opposition of the insurance industry and Republican critics, it might not save much money.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They throw out irrelevant concepts in their research.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So what other variables could be used if the racial concept is thrown out? Yudell said scientists need to get  more specific with their language, perhaps using terms like ancestry or population that might more precisely  reflect  the  relationship  between  humans  and  their  genes,  on  both  the  individual  and  population  level.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A year on, the meetings have made lasting changes to what she throws away in her kitchen.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Consumers in developed countries throw away nearly half of their food purchases because they tend to buy in excessive quantities.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Overall between 30% and 50% of what has been bought in developed countries is thrown away by the purchaser.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Studying goal-setting can throw more light on successful business practices.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I had an old aunt who used to throw cups of tea at people when she was particularly irritated.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She took care never to throw her best china
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why do many people find it funny to see someone throwing a custard pie on their boss's face?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Once Farrant and her colleagues feel they have a better sense of which switches to throw, they will have to find the best way to do so in useful crops.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"抛，投，掷"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: throw, cast, fling, heave, hurl, pitch, toss
means: throw ： 普通用词，使用广泛，仅指用力抛掷，不涉及动作方式或感情色彩。
cast常可与throw互换，指迅速扔出一个重量较轻的物体。
fling ： 指用力投掷，或因感情激动而粗暴地或漫无目的地扔东西。
heave ： 指把重物举起后扔出。
hurl ： 通常指用力投掷，动作迅猛，所投掷的距离也较远。
pitch ： 指随意地、轻轻地掷或扔，侧重方向性和有明确的目标。
toss ： 指无什么目的地、轻轻地、随意地掷或扔，所扔掷的东西一般都比较轻。

example.en: The meetings were 5 dollars a throw.
example.zh: 那几次会议的参加费是毎人五块钱。

list.explanation: 插科打诨，讲笑活，放噱头

example.en: I tove the way he threw away that misquotation.
example.zh: 我很欣赏他讲的笑话，引用那种张冠李戴的方法。

example.en: I knew you' d throw a fit when I told you.
example.zh: 我就知道我一告诉你,你准会大发脾气。

example.en: A throw-out who feigns sickness on the street is trying to gain sympathy from passers for begging money.
example.zh: 一个在街上假装有病的乞丐正在想方设法获取过路人的同情，向他们讨钱。

slang.tokens: throw ones hat in the ring

example.en: The con claimed he needed parole so he coutd throw his hat in the ring for the mayoral election.
example.zh: 那囚犯要求假释，以使他能参加市长竞选。

Sentence.sentence: As I watch her chase after a squirrel, throwing her whole being into the here-and-now of an exercise that has never once ended in victory.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: As the vegetables started coming in, dad threw himself into cooking.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: As we accumulated more devices, however, we didn't throw out our old ones.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: But she expects using the chemical in some kind of industrial process-not simply "millions of worms thrown on top of the plastic".
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Frogs living near brightly lit highways suffer nocturnal light levels that are as much as a million times brighter than normal, throwing nearly every aspect of their behavior out of joint, including their nighttime breeding choruses.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hoping that no one would notice that I was shaking inside, I threw my voice as far as it would reach: "Put your heads on the desks and close your eyes! We are going on a journey."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: If using a portable toilet, always throw away your toilet waste at a proper waste station.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: In a throwaway economy, you would throw away 5, 475 cans over the car's 15-year lifetime.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: In addition, their arms that are unnecessary for moving around are freed for other purposes, like throwing stones or signaling.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: In our modern world, when something wears out, we throw it away and buy a new one.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the United States alone, over 100 million cell-phones are thrown away each year.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Last October, while tending her garden in mora, Sweden, Lena Pahlsson pulled out a handful of small carrots and was about to throw them away.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: On the third Monday of April, the holiday sechselauten is kicked off when a cotton snowman called the boogg is stuffed with explosive and paraded through town by bakers and other tradesmen who throw bread to the crowds.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: On the way, they must not kick or throw their cheese, or go into their competitors' lane.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Should you come across waste paper thrown out of a passing car, pick it up.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: So no one throws things onto the stage in Australia?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: The battle lasts little more than half an hour, in which time around 50, 000 kilograms of tomatoes have been thrown at anyone or anything that moves, runs, or fights back.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The problem is that countries around the world have growing mountains of rubbish because people are throwing out more rubbish than ever before.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The result is that we throw away useful possessions to make room for new ones.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: They never throw things at him.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 选项

Sentence.sentence: They're the little spots of color like throw pillows, mirrors and baskets that most of US used to add visual interest to our rooms.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Viewing childhood development as a scientific investigation throws light on how children learn, but it also offers an inspiring look at science and scientists.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: We need to repair our possessions instead of throwing them away.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: We passed it, he tried to put it in his mouth, he tried bouncing it, rollingit, sitting on it, throwing it.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: We've grown so used to this orange haze that the original glory of an unlit night--dark enough for the planet venus to throw shadow on earth.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: When I threw carrot slices, they even came for a nibble.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: While restaurants throw away tons of food each year, much of it remains inaccessible because of locked garbage containers, health regulations, or business policies.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: "When I come home from a hard day's work, I often feel tired," Danaher says, adding,"In a world in which I don't have to work, I might feel rather different" - perhaps different enough to throw himself into a hobby or a passion project with the intensity
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

means.word_mean: 投; 掷; 扔; 抛

sentences.en: It's my turn to throw.
sentences.cn: 轮到我投了。

sentences.en: He threw his last four grenades.
sentences.cn: 他投出了最后四颗手榴弹。

sentences.en: Throw me that book.
sentences.cn: 把那本书扔给我。

sentences.en: He was thrown a book.
sentences.cn: 有人扔给他一本书。

sentences.en: He threw some coins to the beggar.
sentences.cn: 他向乞丐丢去了几个硬币。

sentences.en: He threw the door open and walked in.
sentences.cn: 他猛地把门打开, 走了进去。

sentences.en: He made a nice throw.
sentences.cn: 他掷得好。

sentences.en: She achieved a throw of sixty metres in the javelin event.
sentences.cn: 在掷标枪项目中, 她掷了60米远。

means.word_mean: 猛动（头、臂、腿）；挺起（胸）；仰起（头）；挥动（拳头、手臂）
使处于，使陷入（某种状态）
使心烦意乱；使困惑；使惊奇
掷（色子）；掷出（色子的点数）
使变音；使嗓音听起来像来自他人（或他处）
按动，扳动，推动（开关、操作杆等）
故意输掉（本应获胜的比赛或竞赛） </seg>

data.mean: 使处于，使陷入（某种状态）
使变音；使嗓音听起来像来自他人（或别处）
throw sth↔away 扔掉；丢弃；抛弃
throw yourself at sth/sb 冲向（人或物）；向…猛扑过去
throw sth↔away 失去；错过；浪费；白费
throw sth↔out 冒（烟）；发（光）；散发出（热）

fixed_phrase_list.cn: 扔掉，放过，浪费时间或金钱

jx.jx_cn_mean: （拳击手或其助手将毛巾、海绵扔进拳击场内以示）认输

entry.def: When you throw an object that you are holding, you move your hand or arm quickly and let go of the object, so that it moves through the air.

example.ex: He spent hours throwing a tennis ball against a wall...
example.tran: 他好几个小时都对着一堵墙掷网球。

example.ex: On one occasion, his father threw a radio at his mother...
example.tran: 他父亲曾有一次拎起收音机砸向他的母亲。

entry.def: If you throw your body or part of your body into a particular position or place, you move it there suddenly and with a lot of force.
entry.tran: 急伸，猛动(身体或某部位)

example.ex: She threw her arms around his shoulders...
example.tran: 她一把搂住他的肩膀。

example.ex: She threatened to throw herself in front of a train...
example.tran: 她威胁要卧轨。

entry.def: If you throw something into a particular place or position, you put it there in a quick and careless way.

example.ex: He struggled out of his bulky jacket and threw it on to the back seat...
example.tran: 他费劲脱下他那件笨重的夹克，随手把它扔在后座上。

example.ex: Why not throw it all in the pot and see what happens?
example.tran: 为什么不把它全扔进罐子，看看会发生什么变化？

entry.def: To throw someone into a particular place or position means to force them roughly into that place or position.

example.ex: He threw me to the ground and started to kick...
example.tran: 他把我摔倒在地，开始用脚踢。

example.ex: The device exploded, throwing Mr Taylor from his car.
example.tran: 那个装置爆炸了，把泰勒先生从车里抛了出去。

entry.def: If you say that someone is thrown into prison, you mean that they are put there by the authorities, especially if this seems unfair or cruel.

example.ex: Those two should have been thrown in jail...
example.tran: 那两个人早就应该抓去坐牢。

example.ex: Police should have the power to fine people who hamper rescue efforts. In fact I'd throw them into prison for a night.
example.tran: 警察应该有权对妨碍救援的人处以罚款。其实要是换了我，非关他们一宿不可。

entry.def: If a horse throws its rider, it makes him or her fall off, by suddenly jumping or moving violently.

example.ex: The horse reared, throwing its rider and knocking down a youth standing beside it.
example.tran: 那匹马尥了个蹶子，把骑手掀下马，还撞倒了旁边站着的一个小伙子。

entry.def: If a person or thing is thrown into an unpleasant situation or state, something causes them to be in that situation or state.
entry.tran: 使处境不利;使进展不顺

example.ex: Abidjan was thrown into turmoil because of a protest by taxi drivers...
example.tran: 出租车司机的抗议使得阿比让陷入了混乱。

example.ex: Economic recession had thrown millions out of work...
example.tran: 经济衰退导致数百万人失业。

entry.def: If something throws light or a shadow on a surface, it causes that surface to have light or a shadow on it.
entry.tran: 投下，洒下，抛下(光线或影子)

example.ex: The sunlight is white and blinding, throwing hard-edged shadows on the ground.
example.tran: 阳光明亮刺眼，在地上投下轮廓分明的影子。

entry.def: If something throws doubt on a person or thing, it causes people to doubt or suspect them.

example.ex: This new information does throw doubt on their choice...
example.tran: 这个新信息确实使人们对他们的选择产生了怀疑。

example.ex: She did not attempt to throw any suspicion upon you.
example.tran: 她无意让大家怀疑你。

entry.def: If you throw a look or smile at someone or something, you look or smile at them quickly and suddenly.
entry.tran: 飞快(看)一眼;迅速(笑)一下

example.ex: Emily turned and threw her a suggestive grin.
example.tran: 埃米莉转过头，冲她意味深长地一笑。

entry.def: If you throw yourself, your energy, or your money into a particular job or activity, you become involved in it very actively or enthusiastically.

example.ex: She threw herself into a modelling career...
example.tran: 她投身于模特事业。

example.ex: They threw all their military resources into the battle.
example.tran: 他们将全部军事资源都投入了那场战斗。

entry.def: If you throw a fit or a tantrum, you suddenly start to behave in an uncontrolled way.

example.ex: I used to get very upset and scream and swear, throwing tantrums all over the place.
example.tran: 以前，我动不动就发脾气，大喊大叫，还骂人。

entry.def: If something such as a remark or an experience throws you, it surprises you or confuses you because it is unexpected.

example.ex: The professor rather threw me by asking if I went in for martial arts...
example.tran: 教授问我是否爱好武术，这个问题让我吃了一惊。

example.ex: Obviously the puncture threw me a little, but I'm reasonably happy.
example.tran: 显然，轮胎扎破让我感到有些意外，不过我还是挺开心的。

entry.def: If you throw a punch, you punch someone.

example.ex: Everything was fine until someone threw a punch.
example.tran: 开头还好好的，后来不知是谁动了拳头。

entry.def: When someone throws a party, they organize one, usually in their own home.

example.ex: Why not throw a party for your friends?
example.tran: 干吗不在家里为你的朋友们搞个聚会？

entry.def: When someone throws a switch, they turn it on or off.

example.ex: Prince Edward threw the switch to light the illuminations.
example.tran: 爱德华王子按动开关亮起彩灯。

entry.def: In sports, if a player throws a game or contest, they lose it as a result of a deliberate action or intention.

example.ex: ...offering him a bribe to throw the game.
example.tran: 向他行贿，叫他故意输掉比赛

entry.def: A throw is a light rug, blanket, or cover for a sofa or bed.
If things cost a particular amount of money a throw, they cost that amount each.

example.ex: Most applications software for personal computers cost over $500 a throw.
example.tran: 个人电脑使用的多数应用软件的单价为 500 多美元。

entry.def: If someone throws themselves at you, they make it very obvious that they want to begin a relationship with you, by behaving as though they are sexually attracted to you.

example.ex: I'll say you started it, that you threw yourself at me.
example.tran: 我觉得是你主动向我投怀送抱。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of throwing (propelling something through the air with a rapid movement of the arm and wrist);

sentences.sentence: "the catcher made a good throw to second base"

means.word_mean: 3. the maximum movement available to a pivoted or reciprocating piece by a cam
4. the distance that something can be thrown;

sentences.sentence: "it is just a stone's throw from here"

means.word_mean: 5. bedclothes consisting of a lightweight cloth covering (an afghan or bedspread) that is casually thrown over something
6. the throwing of an object in order to determine an outcome randomly;

sentences.sentence: "he risked his fortune on a throw of the dice"
"he shed his image as a pushy boss"

means.word_mean: 4. place or put with great energy;

sentences.sentence: "She threw the blanket around the child"
"thrust the money in the hands of the beggar"

means.word_mean: 5. convey or communicate; of a smile, a look, a physical gesture;
6. cause to go on or to be engaged or set in operation;

sentences.sentence: "She threw the flashlight beam into the corner"

means.word_mean: 8. to put into a state or activity hastily, suddenly, or carelessly;
14. throw (a die) out onto a flat surface;
15. be confusing or perplexing to; cause to be unable to think clearly;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thrāwan 'to twist, turn', of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch draaien and German drehen, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin terere 'to rub', Greek teirein 'wear out'. Sense 1, expressing propulsion and sudden action, dates from Middle English

sentences.en: Economic recession had thrown millions out of work...

sentences.cn: 阳光明亮刺眼，在地上投下轮廓分明的影子。
sentences.en: The sunlight is white and blinding, throwing hard-edged shadows on the ground.

sentences.cn: 这个新信息确实使人们对他们的选择产生了怀疑。
sentences.en: This new information does throw doubt on their choice...

sentences.cn: 她无意让大家怀疑你。
sentences.en: She did not attempt to throw any suspicion upon you.

sentences.cn: 埃米莉转过头，冲她意味深长地一笑。
sentences.en: Emily turned and threw her a suggestive grin.

sentences.cn: 她投身于模特事业。
sentences.en: She threw herself into a modelling career...

sentences.cn: 他们将全部军事资源都投入了那场战斗。
sentences.en: They threw all their military resources into the battle.

sentences.cn: 以前，我动不动就发脾气，大喊大叫，还骂人。
sentences.en: I used to get very upset and scream and swear, throwing tantrums all over the place.

sentences.cn: 教授问我是否爱好武术，这个问题让我吃了一惊。
sentences.en: The professor rather threw me by asking if I went in for martial arts...

sentences.cn: 显然，轮胎扎破让我感到有些意外，不过我还是挺开心的。
sentences.en: Obviously the puncture threw me a little, but I'm reasonably happy.

sentences.cn: 开头还好好的，后来不知是谁动了拳头。
sentences.en: Everything was fine until someone threw a punch.

sentences.cn: 干吗不在家里为你的朋友们搞个聚会？
sentences.en: Why not throw a party for your friends?

sentences.cn: 爱德华王子按动开关亮起彩灯。
sentences.en: Prince Edward threw the switch to light the illuminations.

sentences.cn: 向他行贿，叫他故意输掉比赛
sentences.en: ...offering him a bribe to throw the game.

sentences.cn: 个人电脑使用的多数应用软件的单价为 500 多美元。
sentences.en: Most applications software for personal computers cost over $500 a throw.

sentences.cn: 我觉得是你主动向我投怀送抱。
sentences.en: I'll say you started it, that you threw yourself at me.

sentences.cn: 准确的投掷
sentences.en: a well-aimed throw

sentences.cn: 57米远的标枪投掷
sentences.en: a javelin throw of 57 metres

sentences.cn: 他们称潜艇为铁鱼，把小型投掷炸弹称作土豆。
sentences.en: They called a submarine an iron fish and a small bomb thrown by hand a potato
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 他们向过往的轿车和公共汽车投掷石块.
sentences.en: They were throwing rocks at passing cars and buses.

sentences.cn: 田赛项目可分为两类: 跳跃和投掷.
sentences.en: Events in the field can be divided into two sections; jumping and throwing.

sentences.cn: 增加投掷物品的恢复机会.
sentences.en: Increased chances of regenerate quantity affixes on throwing items.

sentences.cn: 投掷武器专精: 增加投掷武器技能.
sentences.en: Throwing Weapon Specialization: Increase Throwing Weapon skill.

sentences.cn: 他投掷得很好, 他能投100米远.
sentences.en: He throws well. He can throw a hundred yards.

sentences.cn: 在加沙地区, 大约两千五百名巴勒斯坦失业者拥向议会大楼, 他们向警察投掷石块,并且砸碎了窗户玻璃.
sentences.en: In Gaza, about 2500 unemployed Palestinians stormed the parliament building, throwing stones at police and breaking windows.

sentences.cn: 苏格兰场说使用警戒线是因为一直有投掷物扔向警察.
sentences.en: Scotland Yard said a cordon was used because missiles were being thrown at officers.

sentences.cn: 标枪出手之前, 身体不得完全转向背对投掷弧.
sentences.en: Before re 1 easing the javelin, the competitor may not turn his or her back toward throwing arc.

sentences.cn: 人们常向他投掷石块, 有时击中了他.
sentences.en: People often threw stones at him, and sometimes they hit him.

sentences.cn: 一些学生已经准备好投掷雪球和那些从大街上拣来的塑料瓶了.
sentences.en: Some were already throwing snowballs and plastic bottles from the pavement.

sentences.cn: 向他投掷! 我谅你也不敢!
sentences.en: Throw it at him! I dare you!

sentences.cn: 如果你直接朝着你的面前投掷,那么它将闪到你自己.
sentences.en: If you throw It'straight in front of you it will blind you as well.

sentences.cn: 投掷水球是一种很流行的夏季娱乐活动.
sentences.en: Throwing balloons filled with water is a popular summer pasttime.

sentences.cn: 投掷或发出的行为或方式.
sentences.en: The act or manner of throwing or discharging.

sentences.cn: 田赛可分为跳跃和投掷两大类.
sentences.en: Field events can be divided into two major categories: jumping and throwing.

sentences.cn: 在器械出手的瞬间,运动员必须留在投掷圈内.
sentences.en: He must deliver the missile and at the same time stay inside the throwing circle.

sentences.cn: 王子又向魔鬼投掷他的第四个武器 —— 矛.
sentences.en: He threw his fourth weapon, his spear, at the monster.

sentences.cn: 标枪出手之前.身体不得完全转向背对投掷弧.
sentences.en: Before re 1 easing the javelin competitor may not turn his or her back toward throwing arc.

sentences.cn: 匕首单手锤单手剑枪弩弓投掷武器.
sentences.en: Dagger Sword gun crossbow with one hand hammer throwing weapons.

sentences.cn: 翻译为训练武器大师使他成为投掷剑的高手.
sentences.en: Trains the Blademaster to become highly adept in the art of throwing swords.

sentences.cn: 投掷西红柿的活动大约在上午十一点开始,持续将近两个小时.
sentences.en: The throwing starts around 11 a.m. and lasts for about two hours.

sentences.cn: 她说只有在投掷的距离和身体的攻击性方面能够体现出男女的不同.
sentences.en: She said only throwing distance and physical aggression showed marked gender differences.

sentences.cn: 但如果是同样重量的岩石,恐怕自己连对方一半距离也投掷不及.
sentences.en: He couldn't throw a rock that weight more than half that distance.

sentences.cn: 那个年轻运动员投掷得很好.
sentences.en: The young athlete throws well.

sentences.cn: 他与店员动手向窗外投掷家具,椅子、桌子飞落到拱廊街上.
sentences.en: He and his assistants began throwing furniture out of the window.

sentences.cn: 那个残忍的男孩用石头投掷青蛙.
sentences.en: The cruel boy threw stones at the frogs.

sentences.cn: 投掷或滚动 ( 球 )
sentences.en: To throw or roll ( a ball ).

sentences.cn: 她说只有在投掷的距离和身体的攻击性方面能够体现出男女的不同.
sentences.en: She said only throwing distance and physical aggression showed marked gender differences.

Sentence.sentence: A decorated egg thrown into the field would be a wish for a good harvest.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One of the great things about freshman housing is that, with some exceptions, the process throws you together randomly," said Undergraduate Assembly chairman Alec Webley.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Come to think of it, my parents did throw her a surprise party that year.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Once you are done demonstrating whatever concept was in the textbook, you throw away the pipe cleaners, the straws, the cardboard tubes.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Songdo is a stone's throw from South Korea's Incheon airport, its main international hub(枢纽).
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B
